title: Emerging investigator series: predicted losses of sulfur and selenium in european soils using machine learning: a call for prudent model interrogation and selection
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1503-1515
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00338A, Paper
Gerrad D. Jones, Logan Insinga, Boris Droz, Aryeh Feinberg, Andrea Stenke, Jo Smith, Pete Smith, Lenny H. E. Winkel
Changes in soil organic carbon, evapotranspiration, and S and Se atmospheric deposition are predicted to decrease S and Se concentrations in Europe soils.
